price: 18. Wuxuu wax ka arkay (Nabigu s.c.w) Calaamooyinka Rabbigi ee waaweyn.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
